5.title: Gluten Free Food Files: Episode 2
5.plot: Join host Christina 'Kit' Vinsick on her quest across New York City to find gluten free substitutes for all of her favorite treats and eats. On this episode, she visits Mille-feuille Bakery on, as Chef Olivier Dessyn shows us how to prepare the famous Ispahan Macaron Dessert.

imdb.plot outline: Join host Christina 'Kit' Vinsick on her quest across NYC, to find gluten free substitutes for all of her favorite treats and eats, while discovering new ones along the way. You'll find gluten free recipes that can be enjoyed by everyone, not just those with Celiac Disease! Meet the minds behind her best finds, on Gluten Free Food Files by Folded Leaf TV on YouTube. Season 1: Episodes 1-5, launching in June 2016.
